comment.author: 54801010@N00
comment._content:
Is the young woman standing between the lady with the beehive and the lady with the hat Adrienne C. Thomas (Acting) 
Archivist of the United States?

comment.author: 24206740@N07
comment._content: I don't think that's Adrienne. The caption says it's Bonnie Walter.  I'll ask my mom, the second contestant from the right (Frances Brooks) if she knows if that really is Bonnie Walter. I think this photo was taken before Adrienne came to the agency.

comment.author: 24206740@N07
comment._content:
Frances Brooks (my mom) confirmed that the woman who's fourth from the right is Bonnie Walter and that Adrienne Thomas began working at  NARS (now NARA) after the contest.  

It's funny you mention this being Adrienne Thomas because I happen to have a photo of her in a group of NARS employees ca. 1970.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi kwistalmd,

Thanks for helping us put a name to a face! 

Deon (U.S. National Archives)

comment._content: It would be great to bring a contest such as this back
